verses.plain: And it came to pass on the eighth day, that Moses called Aaron and his sons, and the elders of Israel;

tokens.t: And it came to pass on the eighth day,
Moses called Aaron and his sons, and the elders of Israel;

verses.plain: And he said unto Aaron, Take thee a young calf for a sin offering, and a ram for a burnt offering, without blemish, and offer them before the LORD.

tokens.t: And he said unto Aaron, Take thee a young calf for a sin offering, and a ram for a burnt offering, without blemish, and offer
before the

verses.plain: And unto the children of Israel thou shalt speak, saying, Take ye a kid of the goats for a sin offering; and a calf and a lamb, both of the first year, without blemish, for a burnt offering;

tokens.t: And unto the children of Israel thou shalt speak, saying, Take ye a kid of the goats for a sin offering; and a calf and a lamb,
of the first year, without blemish, for a burnt offering;

verses.plain: Also a bullock and a ram for peace offerings, to sacrifice before the LORD; and a meat offering mingled with oil: for to day the LORD will appear unto you.

tokens.t: Also a bullock and a ram for peace offerings, to sacrifice before the
; and a meat offering mingled with oil: for to day the
will appear unto you.

verses.plain: ¶ And they brought that which Moses commanded before the tabernacle of the congregation: and all the congregation drew near and stood before the LORD.

tokens.t: ¶ And they brought
which Moses commanded before the tabernacle of the congregation: and all the congregation drew near and stood before the

verses.plain: And Moses said, This is the thing which the LORD commanded that ye should do: and the glory of the LORD shall appear unto you.

tokens.t: And Moses said, This
the thing which the
commanded that ye should do: and the glory of the
shall appear unto you.

verses.plain: And Moses said unto Aaron, Go unto the altar, and offer thy sin offering, and thy burnt offering, and make an atonement for thyself, and for the people: and offer the offering of the people, and make an atonement for them; as the LORD commanded.

tokens.t: And Moses said unto Aaron, Go unto the altar, and offer thy sin offering, and thy burnt offering, and make an atonement for thyself, and for the people: and offer the offering of the people, and make an atonement for them; as the
commanded.

verses.plain: ¶ Aaron therefore went unto the altar, and slew the calf of the sin offering, which was for himself.

tokens.t: ¶ Aaron therefore went unto the altar, and slew the calf of the sin offering, which
for himself.

verses.plain: And the sons of Aaron brought the blood unto him: and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put it upon the horns of the altar, and poured out the blood at the bottom of the altar:

tokens.t: And the sons of Aaron brought the blood unto him: and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put
upon the horns of the altar, and poured out the blood at the bottom of the altar:

verses.plain: But the fat, and the kidneys, and the caul above the liver of the sin offering, he burnt upon the altar; as the LORD commanded Moses.

tokens.t: But the fat, and the kidneys, and the caul above the liver of the sin offering, he burnt upon the altar; as the
commanded Moses.

verses.plain: And the flesh and the hide he burnt with fire without the camp.

tokens.t: And the flesh and the hide he burnt with fire without the camp.

verses.plain: And he slew the burnt offering; and Aaron’s sons presented unto him the blood, which he sprinkled round about upon the altar.

tokens.t: And he slew the burnt offering; and Aaron’s sons presented unto him the blood, which he sprinkled round about upon the altar.

verses.plain: And they presented the burnt offering unto him, with the pieces thereof, and the head: and he burnt them upon the altar.

tokens.t: And they presented the burnt offering unto him, with the pieces thereof, and the head: and he burnt
upon the altar.

verses.plain: And he did wash the inwards and the legs, and burnt them upon the burnt offering on the altar.

tokens.t: And he did wash the inwards and the legs, and burnt
upon the burnt offering on the altar.

verses.plain: ¶ And he brought the people’s offering, and took the goat, which was the sin offering for the people, and slew it, and offered it for sin, as the first.

tokens.t: ¶ And he brought the people’s offering, and took the goat, which
the sin offering for the people, and slew it, and offered it for sin, as the first.

verses.plain: And he brought the burnt offering, and offered it according to the manner.

tokens.t: And he brought the burnt offering, and offered it according to the manner.

verses.plain: And he brought the meat offering, and took an handful thereof, and burnt it upon the altar, beside the burnt sacrifice of the morning.

tokens.t: And he brought the meat offering, and took an handful thereof, and burnt
upon the altar, beside the burnt sacrifice of the morning.

verses.plain: He slew also the bullock and the ram for a sacrifice of peace offerings, which was for the people: and Aaron’s sons presented unto him the blood, which he sprinkled upon the altar round about,

tokens.t: He slew also the bullock and the ram
a sacrifice of peace offerings, which
for the people: and Aaron’s sons presented unto him the blood, which he sprinkled upon the altar round about,

verses.plain: And the fat of the bullock and of the ram, the rump, and that which covereth the inwards, and the kidneys, and the caul above the liver:

tokens.t: And the fat of the bullock and of the ram, the rump, and that which covereth
, and the kidneys, and the caul
the liver:

verses.plain: And they put the fat upon the breasts, and he burnt the fat upon the altar:

tokens.t: And they put the fat upon the breasts, and he burnt the fat upon the altar:

verses.plain: And the breasts and the right shoulder Aaron waved for a wave offering before the LORD; as Moses commanded.

tokens.t: And the breasts and the right shoulder Aaron waved
a wave offering before the
; as Moses commanded.

verses.plain: And Aaron lifted up his hand toward the people, and blessed them, and came down from offering of the sin offering, and the burnt offering, and peace offerings.

tokens.t: And Aaron lifted up his hand toward the people, and blessed them, and came down from offering of the sin offering, and the burnt offering, and peace offerings.

verses.plain: And Moses and Aaron went into the tabernacle of the congregation, and came out, and blessed the people: and the glory of the LORD appeared unto all the people.

tokens.t: And Moses and Aaron went into the tabernacle of the congregation, and came out, and blessed the people: and the glory of the
appeared unto all the people.

verses.plain: And there came a fire out from before the LORD, and consumed upon the altar the burnt offering and the fat: which when all the people saw, they shouted, and fell on their faces.

tokens.t: And there came a fire out from before the
, and consumed upon the altar the burnt offering and the fat:
when all the people saw, they shouted, and fell on their faces.

footnotes.text: took…: Heb. filled his hand out of it
